title: BRIEF-Maruti Suzuki India Cuts Prices On Some Car Models

BRIEF-Maruti Suzuki India Cuts Prices On Some Car Models

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 10:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Maruti Suzuki India Cuts Prices On Some Car Models Sept 25 (Reuters) - Maruti Suzuki India Ltd : * SAYS CUTS PRICES, ALIGNS WITH GOVERNMENT TO REVIVE DEMAND * NEW PRICES WILL BE APPLICABLE FROM 25TH SEPTEMBER 2019, ACROSS THE COUNTRY * SAYS DECIDED TO REDUCE PRICE OF SELECT MODELS BY 5,000 RUPEES (ON EX-SHOWROOM PRICE) * PPTIMISTIC THE PRICE REDUCTION WILL BRING DOWN THE COST OF ACQUISITION ESPECIALLY FOR THE ENTRY-LEVEL CUSTOMERS * SAYS PRICE CUTS WILL BE OVER AND ABOVE CURRENT PROMOTIONAL OFFERS
